resources.string: The battery has less than 30%, please retry when battery is full!
Please retry while unplug the charger!
This operation will delete the downloading file.
Download complete, please click to install
You are under non-WiFi network, you may have extra charges if it is not included in your subscription. Would you like to continue to download?
The new version is downloading, please wait...
No zip file in this folder!
The installation need at least %s bytes storage. Please release space to continue.
Your system is currently up to date.
FOTA does not supported on this device!
A new version is available, please click to install.
Package error. Please check update and download again.
Sorry,FotaUpdateReboot file is not exiting, an unexpected error happened!
Your system was damaged, wireless update is disabled!
Your system was damaged, you just only download and install the full update file! Please backup your data before!

<Data> <div style=font-size:15px;color:#4c4c4c><p>1. Please make sure the selected file is official;</p> <p>2. Local Update may wipe your data, please backup before updating;</p> <p>3. Install the wrong update file will damage your device;</p> <p>4. Click [Update now] button, your device will enter into the Recovery Mode. Please do not remove the battery and do nothing until the update has been completed.</p></div> </Data>" "
Pasting into the root directory, please wait...
Update file is not existing, please select again.
No SD card or no enough storage space on SD card.
Your device will be bricked if you choose and install an unofficial or incompatible zip file!
Set the cycle to check for update automatically
Update packages will be downloaded automatically
You are in 2G/3G, please change the [Updates via Wi-Fi only] option and try again.
Update packages download via Wi-Fi only

<Data> <div style=font-size:15px;color:#4c4c4c><p>1. FOTA can help your device to run smoother and more efficiently.</p> <p>2. It is recommended that you download the update package via Wi-Fi.</p> <p>3. Please make sure your device have more than 30% charge left on the battery, and unplug the charger before upgrade.</p> <p>4. Your device may reboot several times during installation, please do not remove the battery and do nothing until the update has been completed.</p></div> </Data>" "
Tips:During updating, any actions are invalid. The whole progress will take a few minutes, please make sure there is enough power.
